I

IConsonance - Interface in rationalpiano.consonance
Calculates the consonances for a range of notes (on the 12TET scale) given a set of active notes with different volumes.
IDrawable - Interface in rationalpiano.graphic
An element that can be drawn on screen.
IGraphicControls - Interface in rationalpiano.graphic
Manages all screen elements, i.e. the background, the vertical lines (and in the future text and the parameter controls) Provides methods to draw and access those objects
IGraphicVisualizationElement - Interface in rationalpiano.graphic
Interface for a graphic visualization element which can be changed in its appearance.
IGraphicVisualizationElementArray - Interface in rationalpiano.graphic
Represents an array of several IGraphicVisualizationElement objects with iterated corresponding MIDI note numbers.
IKeyInput - Interface in rationalpiano.input
Provides callback methods for pressing and releasing keyboard keys.
IMouseInput - Interface in rationalpiano.input
Provides callback methods for pressing and releasing mouse buttons.
incrementHoldtime() - Method in class rationalpiano.voicemanagement.OneVoice
Adds one to the holdtime.
initialize(int, int, double) - Method in class rationalpiano.consonance.Consonance
Calculates the dissonance of all intervals in the parametrized range with the given maximum dissonance and bell width.
initialVelocity - Variable in class rationalpiano.voicemanagement.OneVoice
 
initiate(Level, boolean, String) - Static method in class rationalpiano.logging.RationalLogger
Initiate the top logger with the specified log level.
INoteOutput - Interface in rationalpiano.noteout
Manages note output for MIDI and OSC Allows to turn on/off notes/voices on a midi channel / osc port and to de/activate sustain
INoteOutput.outputModes - Enum in rationalpiano.noteout
Possible modes of note message outputs: either only via MIDI, only via OSC or both
INoteOutput.outputModes() - Constructor for enum rationalpiano.noteout.INoteOutput.outputModes
 
input - Variable in class rationalpiano.run.RationalPiano
 
InputDevs - Class in rationalpiano.input
Manages Input from Mouse, Keyboard, MIDI and Multitouch.
InputDevs(PApplet, IVoices, INoteOutput, IGraphicControls, int, String) - Constructor for class rationalpiano.input.InputDevs
Initializes the input management and generates a TUIO UDP receiver
InputMidi - Class in rationalpiano.input
Receives Midi Notes and CC Messages for Sustain.
InputMidi(PApplet, IVoices, INoteOutput, String) - Constructor for class rationalpiano.input.InputMidi
Initializes the MIDI Input with the given MIDI device.
IPropertyControl - Interface in rationalpiano.graphic
Displays mouse-tweakable controls to change parameters.
isHoldSustain() - Method in class rationalpiano.voicemanagement.FadeTracking
 
isMouseOver() - Method in interface rationalpiano.graphic.IPropertyControl
 
isMouseOver() - Method in class rationalpiano.graphic.PropertyControlP5
 
isMouseOverGraphicVisualizationElementArray() - Method in class rationalpiano.graphic.GraphicControls
 
isMouseOverGraphicVisualizationElementArray() - Method in interface rationalpiano.graphic.IGraphicControls
 
isReleased() - Method in class rationalpiano.voicemanagement.OneVoice
 
ITickable - Interface in rationalpiano.voicemanagement
Provides a function wich allows to do (periodic) recalculations
IVoices - Interface in rationalpiano.voicemanagement
Manages all active voices and provides functions to add/remove voices and to calculate the consonances of all keys in range which also sets the visual element strengthness
